DifficultyLevel.description: For absolute beginners with no prior dance experience or knowledge of basic steps and step patterns.
For those with some basic dance experience, but still learning the fundamentals.
For dancers with some experience and proficiency in basic steps, but not yet ready for more advanced techniques.
For dancers with a solid foundation in basic steps and able to execute simple choreography.
For dancers with intermediate skills, able to execute more complex choreography and demonstrate improved technique.
For advanced dancers with refined technique, able to execute complex choreography and demonstrate mastery of dance principles.
For experienced dancers preparing for competitive championships, requiring high-level technique and precision.
For elite dancers competing at the highest level, requiring exceptional technique, artistry, and performance quality.
